Rulers

  • Tzar Nicolai the 14th of his name

    Previous Ruler

    Nicolai XXIV was an avid fruit grower based in the south of France.. and also a king of the proto-russian alliance.

  • Tzar Nicolai the 15th of his name

    Forever Ruler

    Nicolai XXV is an avid fan of the fruit grown in his fathers gardens, a genius.. and also a king of the proto-russian alliance.
